definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint

pinyin: chu1 ru4 jing4 jian3 yan4 jian3 yi4 ju2

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Zhi4 liang4 Jian1 du1 Jian3 yan4 Jian3 yi4 Zong3 ju2
containing_words.word: 國家質量監督檢驗檢疫總局

definition: Actual practice is the sole criterion for judging truth (item from Deng Xiaoping theory, from 1978)
pinyin: shi2 jian4 shi4 jian3 yan4 zhen1 li3 de5 wei2 yi1 biao1 zhun3
containing_words.word: 實踐是檢驗真理的唯一標準

sentences.english: As a safeguard, officers-in-charge of departments are requested to verify identification by comparing signatures.
sentences.chinese: 爲安全起見，部門負責主管應比對簽字檢驗身份。

sentences.english: Does the supplier have adequate equipment and facilities for performing ISIR's?
sentences.chinese: 供應商是否有足夠的設備進行樣品檢驗？

sentences.english: Clear glass cover allows observation of interior mechanism to aid in setting and checkout.
sentences.chinese: 透明玻璃蓋允許觀察內部機制，以幫助確定和檢驗。

sentences.english: Tests showed increased levels of toxin in shellfish.
sentences.chinese: 檢驗表明水生有殼動物的毒素水平提高了。

sentences.english: The assembly further comprises a test sensor being coupled to the sensor support.
sentences.chinese: 該組件另外包括與傳感器支持物聯接的檢驗傳感器。

sentences.english: Results sometimes you study the performance of the test.
sentences.chinese: 成績有時候是對你學習的好壞的檢驗。

sentences.english: One copy of inspection Report on Quantity and Quality issued SGS at loading port.
sentences.chinese: 裝貨港SGS數量及重量檢驗報告，一份副本。

sentences.english: If necessary, get a separate survey of the engine of a larger sailboat.
sentences.chinese: 如果必要，對大型帆船的引擎進行單獨的檢驗。
紮實的醫學檢驗科知識。

sentences.english: Presents an easy testing method on phase sequence of TXSGA phase switcher.
sentences.chinese: 提出了檢驗TXSGA型移相器相序的一種簡易方法。

sentences.english: Your shipment of goods has been found short in weight by re-inspection.
sentences.chinese: 經再次檢驗發現貴方裝運的貨物重量短缺了。

sentences.english: The intragroup difference of measurement data was detected with the t test.
sentences.chinese: 組間計量資料差異性測定採用t檢驗。

sentences.english: As for the fluorescent powder quality sorting, yanchao lights available comparison test. & k2 ]!
sentences.chinese: 至於熒光粉品質的分選，可用驗鈔燈作對比檢驗。

sentences.english: Prepare the inspection report for NPI model, and tracking if can be closed.
sentences.chinese: 新機種檢驗報告製作，問題點改善追蹤。

sentences.english: He made samplings of the different materials on the very day.
sentences.chinese: 他當天對那些不同的材料分別進行了抽樣檢驗。

sentences.english: The statistic methods were t-test and the correlation analysis.
sentences.chinese: 運用t檢驗和相關分析對計量指標進行統計學分析。

definition: to inspect and verify/experimental verification/to validate (a theory)/to authenticate
to confirm (sth to be true)/to verify
